name: Love of Magic Book 3: The Return
name_original: Love of Magic Book 3: The Return
description:
Love of Magic is an Urban Fantasy Erotic VN/RPG, about discovering your destiny, finding true love and becoming a God. Book 3: The Return is the final book in the Love of Magic Trilogy; You've won her hand, and fought the War... but before happily ever after can become true, you have one final task to complete.


The War was won, but the cost was almost more than you could take. If you are to succeed you need to grow stronger, learn more and build wider alliances. Book 3 adds new Kingdom Events, random characters in Elsewhere and a number of epic, romantic and erotic moments as the story of the Winter King reaches its conclusion.


When you're not saving the world, there's a big sandbox out there of optional quests and fun to be involved with. Get drunk with old friends, go on dates with girls or maybe pick up some lessons in Shibari?


At the heart of Love of Magic sits romance, and especially the relationship between you and Emily Pendragon. Help her heal, and become who she was always meant to be.

  • 20+ hrs story-driven VN/RPG
  • Master the RPG combat system in the optional random dungeons of Elsewhere
  • Meet the Powers of the world, some friendly and some innately hostile to you.
  • Reconnect with lost friends, and discover new ones.
